title: Scuttle Crab Syndrome
body: Basically when you're going through the jungle lets say for a dragon or buff and you see a Scuttle crab, and you just can't resist to kill it first...gets me all the damn time

replies.body: i play karthus and press r to gank both bot and top at the same time! checkmate atheists
I love it for playing Tryndamere if you have to head to another lane give it an aa on your way past to keep that fury from decaying.
I have to admit, I've died a few times because of this. Scuttle Crab Syndrome Kills.
The hardest thing for me, is resisting the urge to kill it when there is a teemo on the other team, it's so much more useful as a shroom sweeper but it's hard to resist xD
I can't help to kill in, but only if drag is already gone, or the enemy jungle is trying to kill it.
